name: Cave Collapse (BPM)
description:
You were exploring a cave when it suddenly collapsed while you were inside. The only way to get out was damaged, and it's up to you to repair it and escape.

I only spent about a total of 5-6 hours on this because I didn't have to much free time for the jam, so the game is lacking tons of features and story.

Controls:
Up Arrow: Jump
Left Arrow: Move left
Right Arrow: Move Right
Space: Interact
